title: The Day of the Ghosts
outcome: With the BCI grip broken and evidence of forced disappearances exposed, residents quietly erased by the system begin returning to Stenograd. Families are reunited, and the 'ghosts' demand dismantling the BCI, forcing the city to confront its past abuses, and redefining justice and belonging.

events.description: Reports emerge of former BCI-flagged and disappeared residents quietly returning to the city, sparking a mix of relief, shock, and fear.
Grassroots leaders organize public gatherings to document stories of the 'ghosts' and demand official recognition and justice for forced disappearances.
District assemblies openly debate dismantling the BCI, with returned citizens advocating for a complete overhaul of social and legal systems.
Families and supporters of the returned stage a massive march, calling for the permanent abolition of scoring and reparations for years of exclusion.
After weeks of debate and protest, the Council agrees to suspend the BCI and initiate public truth hearings—setting the stage for new definitions of citizenship and justice.
